ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Authors are thankful to Manipal Academy of Higher Education, Manipal for TMA Pai PhD Fellowship to Krishnaprasad Baby and Akhil Suresh. Authors are also grateful to ICMR, New Delhi, as Swastika Maity is working under ICMR-SRF (45/33/2019/PHA/BMS). Authors are thankful to Department of Pharmaceutics, Manipal College of Pharmaceutical Sciences facilitating the computer simulations. Schrodinger's Software and Computers were procured under the grant from DST-SERB, New Delhi to Usha YN (EMR/2016/007006).
The project did not have any extramural support.
The authors declare that they do not have any conflict of interest in publishing these data.
